LinkedListPointersForStep Index¶

class LinkedListPointersForStep(traceStackForStep, LinkedListForStep)¶

class to represent the pointers used to point at nodes in the linked list

class constructor

Arguments:
  • traceStackForStep (TraceStack) – Trace object that represent on step
  • LinkedListForStep (LinkedList) – Linked List for the step
LinkedListPointersForStep.addPointer(pointerName, pointeeReference, LinkedListNodePosition)¶

creates a new pointer

Arguments:
  • pointerName (String) – the pointer name
  • pointeeReference (String) – the pointer reference value
  • LinkedListNodePosition (Object) – Linked List pointee node poistion
LinkedListPointersForStep.difference(OtherLinkedListPointersForStep, diff)¶

Calculats the difference between this linked list pointers and the other linkedlist pointers

Arguments:
  • OtherLinkedListPointersForStep (LinkedListPointersForStep) – The other linked list pointers that will be compared with this linked list pointers
  • diff (Hash) – Hash table
LinkedListPointersForStep.equals(OtherLinkedListPointersForStep)¶

checks if the current LinkedListPointersForStep is equal to the other LinkedListPointersForStep

Arguments:
  • OtherLinkedListPointersForStep (LinkedListPointersForStep) – the other LinkedListPointersForStep that will be compared to the current LinkedListPointersForStep
LinkedListPointersForStep.getPointer(index)¶

return the pointer at the specified index

LinkedListPointersForStep.size()¶

returns the number of pointers in the list
